mapper.insert: insert into b_parts (id,create_time,create_by,name,specs,modle,ask,attribute,quantity,sts,is_buy,supplier,applicant,dept,budget,remarks,tem_purch) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ask,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'标准件', #{quantity,jdbcType=BIGINT},'A','是',#{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{budget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'是')
mapper.select: select p.* from b_parts p,b_ord_main o where p.f_id = o.id and o.ord_sts = 'C' and p.sts = 'A' and p.attribute = '通用件'
select p.* from b_parts p,b_ord_main o where p.f_id = o.id and o.ord_sts = 'C' and p.sts = 'B' and p.attribute = '通用件'

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM b_parts p, b_ord_main o WHERE p.f_id = o.id AND ( (p.attribute = '标准件'OR p.attribute = '整体定制') AND p.sts = 'C' AND p.is_buy = '是' AND o.ord_sts = 'C' ) OR ( p.attribute = '通用件' AND p.sts = 'C' AND o.ord_sts = 'C' ) OR (tem_purch = '是' AND sts = 'C')

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM b_parts p,b_ord_main o WHERE (p.f_id = o.id AND (p.attribute = '标准件' OR p.attribute = '整体定制') AND (p.sts = 'A'OR p.sts = 'B') AND p.is_buy = '是' AND o.ord_sts = 'C') OR (p.tem_purch = '是' AND p.sts = 'A')

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM b_parts p,b_ord_main o WHERE p.f_id = o.id AND (p.attribute = '标准件' OR p.attribute = '通用件') AND p.sts = 'A' AND p.is_buy = '否' AND o.ord_sts = 'C' AND ifnull(p.is_pick,'')!= '是'

SELECT p.*,o.mould_nm,o.buy_material,o.dispatch_no, (case when sts='A' then '工艺编制' when sts='B' then '正在投产' when sts='C' then '生产结束待质检' when sts='D' then '质检合格待入库' end) st FROM b_parts p,b_ord_main o WHERE p.f_id = o.id AND p.attribute = '通用件' AND o.ord_sts = 'C' AND ifnull(p.name,'') like concat ('%',#{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND ifnull(o.mould_nm,'') like concat ('%',#{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

SELECT p.*,o.mould_nm,o.buy_material,o.dispatch_no
FROM b_parts p LEFT JOIN b_ord_main o ON p.f_id = o.id WHERE p.sts = 'D' AND ifnull(p.name,'') like concat ('%',#{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND ifnull(o.mould_nm,'') like concat ('%',#{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select input_value from b_parts where id = #{param1,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update b_parts set flow = #{flow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sts = 'B', input_value = #{inputValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update b_parts set sts = 'C', last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update b_parts set is_pick = '是' last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update b_parts set sts = 'B', last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update b_parts set sts = 'A', last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update b_parts set sts = 'A', quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update b_parts set sts = 'D', last_update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select p.* from b_parts p,b_ord_main o where p.f_id = o.id and o.ord_sts = 'C' and p.sts = 'B' and p.attribute = '通用件' and name like #{pattern}
select p.* from b_parts p,b_ord_main o where p.f_id = o.id and o.ord_sts = 'C' and p.sts = 'A' and p.attribute = '通用件' and name like #{pattern}

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM b_parts p, b_ord_main o WHERE p.f_id = o.id AND ( (p.attribute = '标准件'OR p.attribute = '整体定制') AND p.sts = 'C' AND p.is_buy = '是' AND o.ord_sts = 'C' AND name like #{pattern} ) OR ( p.attribute = '通用件' AND p.sts = 'C' AND o.ord_sts = 'C' AND name like #{pattern} )

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM b_parts p,b_ord_main o WHERE (p.f_id = o.id AND (p.attribute = '标准件' OR p.attribute = '整体定制') AND (p.sts = 'A'OR p.sts = 'B') AND p.is_buy = '是' AND o.ord_sts = 'C' AND name like #{pattern}) OR (p.tem_purch = '是' AND p.sts = 'A' AND name like #{pattern})
